text: قد كانت ءايتى تتلى عليكم فكنتم على اعقبكم تنكصون

translations.translation: My Signs were recited to you and you turned round on your heels,
For when My revelations were read out to you, you turned back on your heels and fled
My Signs were rehearsed to you and you turned back on your heels and took to flight,
Our revelations had certainly been recited to you, but you turned your backs to them
“My verses were recited to you, so you used to turn back on your heels.”
Indeed My Ayat used to be recited to you, but you used to turn back on your heels.
My communications were indeed recited to you, but you used to turn back on your heels,
My signs were recited to you, but upon your heels you withdrew,
My revelations were recited unto you, but ye used to turn back on your heels,
My revelations were recited to you, but you turned your backs
Surely My signs have been rehearsed unto you, and upon your heel ye were wont to draw back.
Certainly My signs used to be recited to you, but you used to take to your heels,
My Signs used to be rehearsed to you, but ye used to turn back on your heels-
Indeed My Verses used to be recited to you, but you used to turn back on your heels (denying them, and with hatred to listen to them).
My verses were recited to you, but you turned upon your heels,
My Verses were recited to you, but you turned back on your heels.
My verses had already been recited to you, but you were turning back on your heels
[23:66] Verily My signs, in the Qur’ān, used to be recited to you, but you used to take to your heels, falling back in retreat,
(My revelations) the Qur'an (were recited) and shown (unto you, but ye used to turn back on your heels) to your initial religion,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { فَكُنتُمْ عَلَىٰ أَعْقَابِكُمْ تَنكِصُونَ } معناه تَرجَعُون على أعقابِكم

translations.translation: And His saying, {So you were on the brink of a pit of the Fire, and He saved you from it} - meaning, you were about to return to your own destruction.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
إذ { قَدْ كَانَتْ آيَاتِي } الدالةُ على عظمة ذاتي وعلوٍّ شأني وشدةِ سلطنتي وسطوتي { تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ } تلييناً لقلوبكم وإصلاحاً لعيوبكم { فَكُنتُمْ } من شدة عتوكم واستكباركم { عَلَىٰ أَعْقَابِكُمْ تَنكِصُونَ } [المؤمنون: 66] وترجعون رجوع القهقرى
 منصرفين عن سماعها

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ فكنتم على أعقابكم تَنكصُونَ } أي: ترجعون القهقرى
 وتعرضون عن سماعها أشد الإعراض فضلاً عن تصديقها والعمل بها والنكوص: الرجوع القهقرى وهي أقبح المشية لأنه لا يرى ما وراءه
